name: Raquel
location: Nellis Air Force Base, near the entrance

topics.topic_text: GREETING
topics.response_text: {to the sentry}I'll take this from here!

topics.topic_text: I have some missiles for you.
topics.response_text: How many?

topics.topic_text: All right. Lead the way.
topics.response_text: Follow close - and mind your behavior.{begrudgingly}

topics.topic_text: What's a Master-At-Arms?
topics.response_text: I oversee the security of the Nellis homeland, from the coordination of its defenses to the training and fitness of its population.

topics.topic_text: Let's talk about something else.
topics.response_text: All right.

topics.topic_text: So the fact we're having this conversation means you failed, right?
topics.response_text: I wasn't the one firing the howitzers. If you want to see how good I am at killing savages, I can show you.

topics.topic_text: Mother Pearl said you have a "bug problem?"
topics.response_text: Long story short, the power failed a few days ago because giant ants have tunneled into the generator room and set up a nest.

topics.topic_text: If I do, you'll be the first to know.
topics.response_text: All I need is a pretext.

topics.topic_text: Goodbye.
topics.response_text: We haven't seen the last of each other, savage.

topics.topic_text: I can handle a few ants.
topics.response_text: Sure, anyone can. But there's more than a few down there. See for yourself.

topics.topic_text: I'll do it, even though you're just trying to get me killed.
topics.response_text: Don't get my hopes up.

topics.topic_text: Thanks, but there are easier ways to commit suicide.
topics.response_text: A savage, scared of bugs? I don't believe it. I'm sure you'll change your mind.

topics.topic_text: Still in progress.
topics.response_text: It's not in progress if you're up here talking to me. Get it taken care of.

topics.topic_text: All dead.
topics.response_text: If that's so, why isn't the power back on? Remember how I told you to power up the generators when the ants are dead?

topics.topic_text: Yes, it's safe to go down there now.
topics.response_text: Maybe Pearl is right about you, because I don't know how you pulled that off.

topics.topic_text: Well, most of the ants are dead.
topics.response_text: I didn't tell you to kill most of the ants. It's an either-or proposition. Get down there and finish them off.

topics.topic_text: <Lie> Yep, power on, ant's dead, all good.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] Maybe Pearl is right about you, because I don't know how you pulled that off.

topics.topic_text: Just doing my part to help out.
topics.response_text: I already said you did a good job. I don't give out hugs.

topics.topic_text: Wait. I may have missed an ant or two.
topics.response_text: You may have missed an ant or two? Get back down there and finish those ants off!

topics.topic_text: Anything else I can help out with?
topics.response_text: The next time you leave Nellis, keep an eye out for missiles. We're down to a five-year supply for our launchers.

topics.topic_text: Nice talking to you.
topics.response_text: Right.

topics.topic_text: Will do.
topics.response_text: Come find me when you've got some to turn in.

topics.topic_text: I'm not sure if I'll be able to spare any, but I'll let you know.
topics.response_text: Fine.

topics.topic_text: I have 1 spare missile.
topics.response_text: It's better than nothing.

topics.topic_text: I have 5 spare missiles.
topics.response_text: Thanks. Those'll last us a day.

topics.topic_text: I have 10 spare missiles.
topics.response_text: Good work.

topics.topic_text: Sorry, I was mistaken. I don't have any extra missiles.
topics.response_text: What kind of fool doesn't keep track of reserve ammunition? Don't waste my time.

topics.topic_text: Who is Mother Pearl?
topics.response_text: As I said, she is our Eldest. Mother Pearl has lived at Nellis from the start, and has the wisdom of her age.

topics.topic_text: I think I'll be leaving.
topics.response_text: Unacceptable. You've made it this far, probed our defenses, seen our faces.

topics.topic_text: Are you going to confiscate my weapons?
topics.response_text: Confiscate your weapons? Certainly not! Personal armament is the foundation of social trust and responsibility.{shocked}

description:
Raquel is a 35 year-old Asian Female.

Raquel is a skilled and disciplined Master-at-Arms for the Boomers at Nellis Air Force Base. As an Asian woman, she stands out among the predominantly Caucasian Boomers, but her combat skills and dedication to the base's defense have earned her respect. She can often be found perched on shipping containers near the base entrance, maintaining a watchful eye on the surrounding wasteland.

Raquel's Personality: Raquel is stern, disciplined, and highly focused on her duties. She takes her role as Master-at-Arms seriously and expects the same level of commitment from others. While she may seem cold and distant at first, she has a soft spot for her fellow Boomers and the history they preserve. She is pragmatic but not cruel, and she values the preservation of pre-war technology and knowledge above all else.

Raquel's Backstory: Raquel was born and raised within the walls of Nellis Air Force Base, making her one of the few native Boomers who can trace her lineage back to the original inhabitants. Her parents were both dedicated members of the Boomers, with her father serving as a pilot and her mother as a mechanic. From a young age, Raquel showed an aptitude for firearms and combat training, quickly rising through the ranks to become the Master-at-Arms. Her Asian heritage comes from her maternal grandmother, who was one of the few outsiders allowed into the community due to her expertise in electronics and engineering. Raquel takes great pride in her role, seeing it as her duty to protect the base and its treasures from the dangers of the wasteland.
